definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Many Chinese undergraduates still find reading the Lianhe Zaobao difficult.
sentences.chinese: 许多华族大学生还是连阅读《联合早报》都很累。

sentences.english: Chinese and Indians form the bulk of the Asian scientists.
sentences.chinese: 亚裔科学家以华族和印族为主。

sentences.english: Most of the Kumemura wanted war with Japan during annexation.
sentences.chinese: 大多数华族琉球人在日本吞并战争时被通缉。

sentences.english: Kukup village about slightly more than a thousand villagers, mostly ethnic Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 龟咯渔村大概有千余名的村民，绝大部分是华族。

sentences.english: Title Leaf architecture and its systematic significance in the tribe Thermopseae (Fabaceae).
sentences.chinese: 豆科黄华族植物叶构造及其分类意义。

sentences.english: Leaf architecture and its systematic significance in the tribe Thermopseae (Fabaceae).
sentences.chinese: 豆科黄华族植物叶构造及其分类意义。

definition: land-owning class, esp. during Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties 魏晉南北朝|魏晋南北朝
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
Han Chinese name for an ancient Central Asia country
common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory/barbarian
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
